string.value: #b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k says she knows how to restore the power of Solomon's Bow. Let's talk to her.
She says you need a #rDevil Hunting Scroll#k in order to restore the power of #rSolomon's Bow#k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k upon completion.
You have restored the power of the legendary, demon-hunting #rSolomon's Bow#k and identified the location of #rAmdusias#k!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 6,000 #Wbasic# #i1452084:# #t1452084:# #c1452084# 1 Able to proceed to 'The Final Battle with Amdusias' as next quest.

Oh no, the demon has taken the power of #rSolomon's Bow#k.
You won't be able to defeat the demon without the power of the bow.

But don't worry. I'll be able to find out how to restore the power of the bow using the ancient book that's been passed down to me.
Please wait a few minutes.

Yes, it's here.

"How will you defeat the demon...Ah, this is giving me a headache..."

(omitted)

"I've figured it out! There is a special spell that can inflict damage on the demon!
 I'm so sick of #rBlue Mushrooms#k now."

See?
You'll be able to acquire something called #rDevil Hunting Scroll#k if you continue to hunt #rBlue Mushrooms#k. I'll restore the power of #rSolomon's Bow#k if you bring me that scroll. For your reference, #rBlue Mushrooms#k can be easily found in #b#m106010100##k.
Let me know when you're ready.

Wow, that was fast. 

Let me see...
I can tell this is the right scroll upon first glance.

I'll begin the restoration process now.
Please wait.

Finally, #rSolomon's Bow#k has been restored!

Ah, it's incredible to see this legendary bow in person! I can already feel the unstoppable force.

But the demon is hurting the townspeople as we speak! Only the final battle remains.
